name: Samiaurai
description:
Embody our feline character in this addictive action adventure, where you must defeat the evil elemental dogs with the help of your trusty katanas.

Retrieve the tuna that has been stolen from you and prove that you are the samiaurai master.

How to play.
1. slide your finger up or down to move between floors.
2. tap and hold the screen to choose a katana.
3. once you have chosen a katana, tap the screen and defeat your enemies
